author: David RAE
comment: App was great to start with then would not send texts from SIM2. Helpline basically ignored me. I think they use bots rather than real people.  Sent my phone log 3 times. Resolved issue myself by deferring to phones own text option v Contacts+. Now looking for an alternative App.

author: Grant Nielsen
comment: OMG I can't believe I haven't left a review for Contact+.. not only is the the best contact management system but I used it for years free & last year I finally got the paid app! I love it so much & how it works/merges Google contacts & Social Media.. downloading friends profile pic to so much more!! You won't regret trying & falling in love with Contact+.. trust me!

reply.author: Contacts Plus team
reply.content: Thank you :-)

author: Company 7
comment: Worlds Leading Contacts App!!!!???I I notice every complaint also seems to be answered by some kind've robot on reviews never so we can see always asking everyone shown to emails them! No solutions evident.... You can't even lock and save a message!? Can't get full size digits when numbers enlargened, can't find hang up button when in different screen! To many apps boast no trial on pro until you pay and regret!

author: Christopher Lawson
comment: Just install it, I'll let you  know what I think about it later, but right now I think it's pretty good.

author: Santosh Ray
comment: Very good app

comment: Caller Id👎👎👎

author: Angel Djambazov
comment: Bought Pro version to help back up SMS. Didn't work. Lost all except the last three months of my messages when I upgraded to my new phone. Tons of texts I had stored permanently lost. Forget the money spent, I am just livid at these developers for selling a product that cost me so many memories.

reply.author: Contacts Plus team
reply.content: Hi Angel, we're here to help - please email us to support@contactspls.com and we'll do our best to assist with this issue. Thanks.

author: wIDo
comment: I think, this apps was good enough. I already bought it. my disappoint are the ads still show up. damn it. ads suddenly pop up on full screen. please give me your reason why you did this?!

reply.author: Contacts Plus team
reply.content: Hi there, can you please check if those ads come from another app installed on your phone, and email us to support@contactspls.com so we could further assist? Thanks!

author: Blaine Bershad
comment: My main issue is it's a huge battery drain on my new Pixel 2 XL. I've had to force stop it a few times. The rest of the app is great, but why have an app that sucks your battery dry when it's not being used?

reply.author: Contacts Plus team
reply.content: Hello Blaine, thank you for letting us know about this issue. Please email our support at: support@contactspls.com and we'll be happy to assist. Thanks :)

author: Vlad Gendelman
comment: Great app. Have been using it for over 2 years. Had an issue recently with battery drain and support team fixed it within a few days of me sending them details. Very impressive.

reply.author: Contacts Plus team
reply.content: Hi Vlad, we're here to help - please email us to support@contactspls.com and we'll do our best to assist with this issue. Thanks!

author: marcmib
comment: It works very good with my OnePlus 5 I hope to see more themes and  the Facebook integration that you used to have or have Facebook like on the Windows phone default app. Also more widgets keep up with the performance updates I like!

reply.content: Thanks for the update! we'll look into it :)
